h5pywrappers

  • 2. h5pywrappers

2. h5pywrappersÂ¶

h5pywrappers is a simple Python library that defines some classes with useful features, such as enforced validation, updatability, pre-serialization, and de-pre-serialization. These classes can be used to define more complicated classes that inherit some subset of the aforementioned features.

Functions

show_config

Print information about the version of h5pywrappers and libraries it uses.

attr

For loading and saving HDF5 object attributes.

dataset

For loading and saving HDF5 datasets.

datasubset

For loading and saving HDF5 "datasubsets".

file

For generating test HDF5 files.

group

For loading and saving HDF5 groups.

json

For loading and saving JSON-related objects.

obj

For identifying and loading HDF5 objects.

scalar

For loading and saving HDF5 "scalars".

version

A module for retrieving the version of this library.
